home.content:
# Auth w/Passport

Welcome to **Lecture 35**! Here is a brief class breakdown.

## Learning Objectives

1. Practice debugging complex serverside code faults
2. Implement basic user authentication with sessions
3. Re-implement with passport

## To Do Today

### [Warmup](#warmup)

### [Passpostjs](#passportjs)

warmup.content:
# Warmup

Here are some basic practice problems.

You will need **[this](https://github.com/mottaquikarim/nycda_lecture_35_debug)** Github repo for both problems. **Be sure to use this repo to begin**.

Exercise 1

Notice how none of the login/signup methods are working. (**Question**: how are they not working??).

Look through the code, troubleshoot this issue.

Exercise 2

Implement login success logic for your auth endpoint.
